reviewText: If you want to play all of those cheery holiday songs on your guitar, look no further than this DVD! It teaches you all of the best Christmas songs, and in a way that I find very easy to learn.

This video and the tabs was very helpful for me (beginner at fingerstyle), but the presentation was a bit lacking. I'd suggest more rehearsal and practice - it would make the lessons flow more smoothly. Good value, though.
